actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce the tax on beer to its pre-1991 level.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce from $18 to $9 (its pre-1991 level) the per-barrel tax on beer.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce the tax on beer to its pre-1991 level.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce the tax on beer to its pre-1991 level.
